docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Macro Rendering Error
docs.text:
File: tags.md

UndefinedError: 'get_tags' is undefined

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\manuel\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\mkdocs_macros\plugin.py", line 688, in render
    return md_template.render(**page_variables)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "C:\Users\manuel\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\jinja2\environment.py", line 1295, in render
    self.environment.handle_exception()
  File "C:\Users\manuel\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\jinja2\environment.py", line 942, in handle_exception
    raise rewrite_traceback_stack(source=source)
  File "<template>", line 3, in top-level template code
  File "C:\Users\manuel\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\jinja2\utils.py", line 92, in from_obj
    if hasattr(obj, "jinja_pass_arg"):
       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
jinja2.exceptions.UndefinedError: 'get_tags' is undefined
